briefTitle: A Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Levodopa-carbidopa Intestinal Gel (LCIG) for the Treatment of Non-motor Symptoms in Patients With Advanced Parkinson's Disease
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Two Part, Multicenter Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Levodopa-Carbidopa Intestinal Gel (LCIG) for the Treatment of Non-Motor Symptoms in Subjects With Advanced Parkinson's Disease

interventions.name: Percutaneous Endoscopic Gastrostomy with Jejunal Extension (PEG-J)

summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate change in non-motor symptoms from baseline to Week 12 as measured by the Non-Motor Symptom Scale total score.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Week 12 in the Non-Motor Symptom Scale (NMSS) Total Score
